projects.name: FreePrint: Opensource 3D Printer
projects.detail: FreePrint is a collection of CAD files, Circuit board designs, and software to build your very own 3D Printer at home.

projects.name: SoundPhonic
projects.detail: The next generation of open source streaming speakers. Build your own wireless boom-box system, and tailor it to your needs

projects.name: Picro
projects.detail: A DIY instant camera that prints directly to inexpensive, easily source-able photo paper.

projects.name: Toolzia
projects.detail: A set of Plasma cutter designs for making your own specialty tools yourself; includes boutique wrenches for working on BMWs, Audis and more

projects.name: BackupBot
projects.detail: Enterprise style, network backups for the home. a set of files for build a rack of drive caddes as well as a FreeNAS configuration for creating a network backup server
